statements: SELECT * FROM music_production_studio_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, storage_location FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Microphone';
SELECT * FROM music_production_studio_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, quantity, storage_location FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE equipment_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity, storage_location FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE equipment_type = 'microphone' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT * FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND storage_location = 'Studio A' ORDER BY equipment_id
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE equipment_type IN ('keyboard', 'guitar') ORDER BY quantity DESC, equipment_name
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, storage_location FROM music_production_studio_inventory WHERE storage_location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY storage_location
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_type FROM music_production_studio_inventory ORDER BY equipment_type
SELECT * FROM studios;
SELECT studio_name, location FROM studios;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, studio_name, location FROM equipment INNER JOIN studios ON equipment.studio_id = studios.studio_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM studios WHERE location='Los Angeles' ORDER BY studio_name DESC;
SELECT studio_id, studio_name, COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM equipment GROUP BY studio_id HAVING total_equipment > 10;
SELECT studio_name, COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment FROM studios LEFT JOIN equipment ON studios.studio_id = equipment.studio_id GROUP BY studio_name;
SELECT studio_name, location, e.equipment_name, e.quantity FROM studios s INNER JOIN equipment e ON s.studio_id = e.studio_id WHERE e.quantity > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT studio_name, location FROM studios WHERE studio_id IN (SELECT studio_id FROM equipment WHERE quantity >= 10);
SELECT * FROM Studio_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM Studio_Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM Studio_Equipment WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Studio_Employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM Studio_Employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM Studio_Equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Studio_Employees WHERE role = 'Manager' AND salary > 50000;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM Studio_Equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT inventory_name, category, location FROM Studio_Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND location = 'Room A';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, salary FROM Studio_Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Studios;
SELECT studio_name, location FROM Studios;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Employees;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentAssignments;
SELECT studio_name, location FROM Studios;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Camera';
SELECT employee_name, role FROM Employees WHERE role LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date, return_date FROM EquipmentAssignments WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT studio_name, equipment_name FROM Studios s INNER JOIN Equipment e ON s.studio_id = e.studio_id;
SELECT * FROM StudioLocations;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM StudioLocations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT equipment_name, brand, model, price FROM Equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT room_number, room_name, description FROM StudioRooms WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, role, phone_number FROM StudioEmployees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT equipment_name, brand, model, price FROM Equipment WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY model;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM StudioLocations WHERE state='California';
SELECT id, room_number, room_name, location_id FROM StudioRooms WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, brand, model, serial_number FROM Equipment WHERE brand='Sony' AND model LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY brand, model;
SELECT employee_name, role, phone_number, email FROM StudioEmployees WHERE role='Manager';
